content: Head through the Sandgate Village and defeat the King of Flowing Sand and his Second Rat Prince son. After defeating the pair (or only the son), head left from the boss arena and into the Valley of Despair.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Yellow Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Head through the Sandgate Village and defeat the King of Flowing Sand and his Second Rat Prince son. After defeating the pair (or only the son), head left from the boss arena and into the Valley of Despair.
